subject: Sales
title: The Brand Promise
description: Learn The Brand Promise in one minute.

hook.text: FedEx promises overnight delivery. Arrive on time and trust grows. Arrive late and trust shatters.

buildup.text: A brand promise is the commitment you make to every customer. It sets expectations before any sale.

discovery.text: The strongest brands keep promises boringly consistent. Reliability creates more value than surprises.

twist.text: Many sellers over-promise to win a deal. The short-term win builds long-term brand damage every time.

climax.text: Define your promise clearly and keep it without exception. Consistency is every great brand's foundation.

punchline.text: Promise only what you'll deliver. Then always deliver.

quiz.question: What happens when sellers consistently over-promise?
options: They build short-term wins but long-term brand damage
